content.detailedDescription:
I noticed bright glowing lights in the sky from my home in st dominick, cornwall as i was walking through a dark room that has beautiful vast views of dartmoor. i clearly noticed them how bright they were in the night sky from the house as soon as i entered the lounge but i had no idea what could cause such a sight.  i went out into the garden for a better view... 

i saw a small cluster of glowing yellow/orange objects over west dartmoor. the objects were a good few miles away from my viewpoint from st dominick, difficult to tell the altitude but the objects looked large. they seemed to "flicker" and were very bright. the most i saw in the cluster at any point was 4 but they would fade in and out randomly and independently of each other over a second or 2 only to reappear a minute of so later. there did seem to be one slightly larger/brighter ball that seemed to stay visible longer than the others over the 15 or so minutes i watched the lights.  for the most part the lights did not seem to move except for one point where 2 of the lights seemed to converge with the slightly brighter/larger orange ball. i could almost make out a shape of craft but it was very difficult to see clearly, despite the objects being intensely bright. 

i tried to call my neighbours from my mobile as my family where on holiday. after failing to reach the neighbours i desperately called a couple of friends who lived on dartmoor to tell them what i was witnessing. i found the sight very exciting although i tried my hardest to remain level-headed and try and figure out what it was that i was seeing.  the objects faded out quite quickly and i assumed they would come back again like they had been doing so for the duration of the sighting but they never did.  

i have seen chinese lanterns, flares, fireworks, all sorts of celestial activity, planes of all kinds and this looked like nothing i've ever seen before. somebody mentioned that it could possibly have been "night drops" from military parachuting exercises over dartmoor, but i'm not convinced this theory either.

however, i did see a relatively low flying helicopter with red strobes, which seemed to be flying around the sky, but not linearly in one direction.  i'd say it was kinda between me and the objects in distance and did come back around on itself a minute or later. i didn't pay much attention to where it entered or exited as i was more focused on the balls of light. 

i wished i hadn't lost my iphone as my old camera phone was too poor quality to pick anything up. never seen anything like that ever. very strange and very exciting to see. i'd been keen to hear from anyone else who saw what i saw...
content.summary: Bright orange balls of light over dartmoor, devon.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter txt me with this message,dad i just saw a ufo and got a pic.What is strange is that i had been on net pass 3days looking at ufo pics.I called her(as waited on pic mail) and she was very upset telling me she was scared cause she went outside to walk baby when she felt she was being watched,as she looked up between trees above small trailer in backyard she saw a hovering craft that didnt look like a plane or jet.She always has a pic phone in pocket for pics she takes of baby.She took a pic and grabed the baby and headed back to house,looking back at the object to get another pic it was gone.She was really upset.About that time my phone said i had pic mail.As i looked at the pic she text under the pic look between trees,i then saw an object that did look odd but a good pic.I sent the pic text to my images on my phone then has i zoomed in i could not belive my eyes.This is a great pic.As good as any.Wow now my daughter sees what i saw 40yrs ago in same area.Im 53 and have been otr truck driver 12 yrs.Ive seen numerous ufos on my trips to la driving through west on interstate 10 and 40.This pic needs to be seen.
content.summary: Walking baby in backyard saw weird object hovering as i got a pic it was gone.Didnt know if i got pic.

content.detailedDescription: Ok basically so many pics + vedeo . just now decided to come out this has tacken controll of my life afect other members of my faimley + some friends as well . i could go into detail for hours but the proof is in the camera it dosent lie! my mom claimed this was demon:s but i say et freaky nonsence . didnt ask for this - willing to take pollygraff or whatever yet its the total proof everyone wants . not so much me . dream of this experance way to often . literally been watch to this day sence incodent has occured . i cant say enough that it happened & its no bull. once again i urge u to give me the benifit of the doubt - contact me - all detailes plus pics and vedio can b 100 percent verified . god - jesus get this to u if im lieing im dieing . my phone (number moved to fi box) cms 09/22/11 21:56 cst flg . i watch show been wondering how to proove what is so real . thanx again for all your help in this . content.summary: Ok u guys this is extremley real!!!! i haveabout 219 videos plus 200 pics . friends heve seen evidence also witnessed events . my brother pointed out 3 moons vertical on one night. this took place over a 3 week period .

content.detailedDescription: Bright light went towards my right from far up in the sky as if it were going towards the earths orbit then it disappeared. 2 minutes later i noticed it flying back still high way above the clouds going left then disappeared after a 1 to 1 1/2 minutes. then 3-5 minutes later i noticed it back to my left going about 10 seconds then it disappeared again. was a bight white looking glow, was too far high up for me to notice exact detail. i was in my back yard on the phone with my sister and my daughter was with me and i was counting planes when i notice object going three directions. with in 15 min span time. looked as if object was moving fast, faster than the usual airplane speed. my feeling are amazed which i hope i got to see my first possible ufo not the typical ifo's. i am a strong believer and will admit i had an encounter with i believe was a gray. i know this sounds crazy but the possibilities are unknown. anyways i will keep and eye out a lot more often.
content.summary: Bright light moved three different directions way above airplaine traffic

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading north on 291 highway from lees summit mo about 8:15 pm cst. as i approached 40 hwy near independence mo i noticed 
a white light in the sky towards my right. the lights were in a bow like arc shape. there were
approx  4-5 lights. they would change color. when they changed color all the lights would be the same color. from white, to red, to blue. 

it was making all these crazy maneuvers in the sky. super fast like. then it would stop and then start the maneuvers again. 

then it suddenly shot off in super fast speed. traffic was slowing down so it seems like other people noticed it too. 

it lasted about 2 and a half mins.

i called my mother while i was looking at it. i have never seen anything like this ever in my 22 yrs of life.
content.summary: Crazy arial maneuvers

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two friends were at the beach in redondo beach, ca, when the incident occurred. we were actually looking for ufos - "ufo gazing" we called it - but none of us had ever seen one nor really expected to. we had been out at a few different beaches that night, staring out over the water for any signs of ufos, and there had been a boat that we assumed was border patrol shining spotlights around, sometimes even on us, for much of the night. we didn't think much of it until later.
at 1:10 am (we looked at our phones a few minutes later and deduced the time as accurately as we could) something caught my eye in my left peripheral. when i swung my head i saw an object that i can only describe as a craft - perhaps a stealth craft. it looked to be about 6 feet long with a slightly shorter width, though it was very difficult to accurately guess its size or distance in the darkness. it was oval shaped, but my first instinct was that its form was somehow related to a manta-ray. the beach we were on was a few dozen feet below the streets and neighborhood, and the object looked as if it must have come from just over the houses on the streets above. it was moving in a completely straight line, was totally silent, and moved very slowly for something flying and with such little noise. it seemed to be grey, slightly lighter than the night sky (los angeles light-polluted night sky mind you) but it could have just as easily been transparent or reflective, and simply hiding in the sky. 
a second or two after noticing the object i yelled out to my friends. one of them had apparently already been watching it for a few seconds before me and said something about first thinking it was a kite and then realizing it was no kite. it was at this moment, the craft still soaring overhead, that i went into a state of disbelief. i would describe it as an altered state. the world i was in seemed like a dream. we were sitting next to a lifeguard tower and as the object glided behind the post of a handrail i jumped up off the sand and started running toward it. i heard pk saying something like, "what? where is it?" so i pointed at it and yelled "right there!" it was still solid and clear as day as i got to the water's edge and watched it disappear into the darkness over the pacific ocean. ch saw it fly away as well. pk never got a glimpse. apparently he was looking out over the ocean the whole time. 
at around 2:00 a.M. we left the beach and dropped pk off at home. ch and i decided to go back to the beach to keep watching the sky. at around 3:30 or 4:00 a.M. a police car rolled slowly and quietly down the bike path on the beach shining a spotlight around the sand. ch and i realized there was no way we could get up and run without them seeing us so we just stayed down on the sand as they rolled on by. were the cop car and the boat related?
content.summary: An dark oval object glided slowly and silently above myself and two friends as we sat on the beach. it flew in a perfect line from over the neighborhood, over us and to the south, and then out into the ocean until we could no longer see it.

content.detailedDescription:
This was reported in the filer's files #38 and #39

denver -- this is a direct response to the posting of a ufo on september 12, 2011 at 8 pm! i too witnessed this event and i must say i was awestruck, however upon further examination it is my conclusion that the ufo's or orbs were not out of the world visitors. instead they were four f-16's doing a flyover from the buckley air national guard for the opening monday night football game of the denver broncos shortly after 8 pm. there was 7000 feet cloud coverage and the f-16's were flying formation with their navigation lights on, which may have given the illusion of bright white yellow orbs. i wish this was a true ufo sighting, but i am sorry to say it was a natural man made event! thanks to mufon cms
----------------------------------------
this isn't correct.  i was at sports authority stadium for the broncos/raiders game.  what was seen were 4 men dropping into the stadium with parachutes.  they had red (flares)fireworks attached on their shoes which emitted a large red glow and sparks.  this was what was reported on filer's files #38 there was no military flyover that evening at the game. i sure that you can confirm this with buckley air base. the broncos lost.....
content.summary: Not correct report

content.detailedDescription:
Bright star glowing changing positions.  once it stopped for a few mins. i then took a picture.  never saw it again.  but have seen a massive star ball with many small stars in it and then they just all broke loose and went up and hovered.  there are alot of strange happenings in the area.

don't really talk about it anymore because not too many people believe.  i know what i saw and have been seeing is not fake or a hoax.  it's been going on for 3 years now and never goes away.  many different scenarios happen at all times of the year.  never have been freightened.....Just curious.  i believe i have seen alot of omg if i was to tell someone they would just laugh at me.
content.summary: Bright star changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:15 and i was on huntingdon pike in rockledge, pa. as i was approaching shady lane, heading westbound, i saw in front of me, above the horizon, and for about what i would estimate a string of 5 or 10 miles in the sky, a random pattern of bright, very bright orange orbs all moving in unison. i thought at first i saw two airplanes in single file coming at me, but they were moving southwesterly after observing them... then i started to see behind them approx 14-16 more, covering a wide patch of sky, all moving together. i pulled over and took a pair of 10x50 binoculars out and looked at them, there were no blinking or airplane lights, no identifiable features, just a bright orange globe. after watching them slowly move from my 11 o'clock position to around 10 o'clock to my forward left, they simultaneously all turned south at the same moment, and within about 10 seconds, accelerated and disappeared from view. 

here is a google streetview of the direction i was facing.. 
(url deleted moved to fi box) cms 09/22/11 21:04 cst flg
content.summary: Group of 15 or so bright orange orb lights, moving then simultaneously changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: I previously sent a report in on my experience, but have had second thoughts about revealing more of my encounter.  as i previously reported, the ufo was shaped like a mercedes benz emblem, three spokes 5-6 ft wide, 25-30 ft long, each spoke. the center was 12-15 ft. across and round, where the spokes met. when i first sighted the ufo, it was just above the horizon across the valley, the spokes were lit a beautiful blue, with white light ends on the last 5 or 6 ft of each spoke.  the center was a large white round light almost the entire center, in fact i could not make out the center outside edges because of the light, even when up close. as i drove toward the ufo, it descended down into the valley and toward me.  the blue lit spokes went out, leaving one small blue light in the center of each spoke near the end white light on each spoke. the spokes were a dull black where they were no longer blue lit.  the white spoke end lights ( barrel like in shape, encompassing the whole spoke end ) began to pulse in changing 2-1, 2-1 several times, in different spoke combinations, and then the center light pulsed brighter that ne  spoke lights one time,while the craft hovered silently less than 100 ft above and off to my front, right side. it was a full moon, no clouds, top down on car.  after a short period, the ufo drifted over my car and then i heard my first sound. the sound was very directional, first i heard a hushed jet engine sound, then a loud crackling / popping sound. very much like static electricity, only very loud, it drowned out the turbine sound i heard as it started across me. as soon as it passed directly over the sound went off. not on/off like a switch, but like quickly turning the volume up and down with a dial. the craft slowly drifted up and barely over the tree tops on the left side of the road and out of my sight. i immediately turned my car around and drove back out into the valley to see if i could spot it again, with out success. a few minutes later across the valley, side i just came from, there was a craft with a spotlight on heading down the ridge the same direction the ufo was last headed, and i could not hear any sound from it as i sat and listened. i failed to mention on my first report that my face and head got warm, or flushed, as the ufo directed the static sound at me, but it went away in a couple of seconds and i just thought it was me getting excited as the static sound engulfing me did startle and concern me at the time. more importantly, after i filed my first report here, i began to feel that a message about our welfare was given to me from that encounter, messages concerning the welfare of our civilization. i have tried to share this with several government and news agencies, and no one is interested in what i have to share. whenever i think of giving up on getting this message out to the public, i get a feeling of despair that is almost overwhelming. the message that i feel i was given is also very clear in my head, and almost overwhelming at times. i fear that i cannot be adamant and clear enough to do the message justice. i have taken and passed a polygraph test, scoring <.01 deception, the best score you can get on a polygraph. i am willing to take more polygraph test if necessary, i will even bet thousands of dollars if anyone is willing to call me out on my encounter. i have been trying to share this for over a year now, and no one in authority is interested.  the messages were about social evolution and pollution worldwide. the need to rid ourselves of tyrants, religious dictators, and corporate owned governments ( basically the whole world needs to change the corrupt ways the governments are run ) we also need to close all nuclear power plants, and go with renewable energy. on renewable energy i got a feeling of using the earths magnetic fields, or electro-magnetic devices, not so clear on that part, as i am not very knowledgeable about that stuff. this is a true statement and i have been as open and honest as i can about my encounter with this ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Spotted 1/2 mile away in valley, it came to me after i came to complete stop in hwy.

content.detailedDescription: Working and went outside to make a call.  saw many objects in the air.  many different sizes and colors.  flash lights, coming from them, kinda aura feeling.  this lasted for about an hour over inner ne portland oregon.  way north of alberta street and possibly over washington near camas.  i told my roommate who also saw along with a co-worker of mine.
content.summary: I saw multiple ufo's last night of all different shapes, colors and sizes over ne portland oregon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was viewing a pitch for a re-roof (via google) and saw a dark disk in the background; i followed it frame by frame (to the best of my ability)but it disappeared from all view and the van could not have driven hardly ten feet.  i turned the viewer up to search the sky for that dark disk and there before my eyes, was the "holy grail" of einstein's theory - the bending of the fabric of our atmosphere, right before my eyes, with a beautiful disk just about to enter (so i presume) into one of two super-shafts of light bending our blue sky, like a whirlpool, with the disk placed right there, at the shaft.

more to come...

dedicated to all those who would bury their head in the sand...
content.summary: To make a long story less...

content.detailedDescription: On 20th september at approximately 8.30pm, myself, my husband and roommate were standing on the porch looking in the direction of where we had seen a sighting the night before, which was over hesperia near the apple valley mountains.  a bright orange light appeared with 3 other lights to its right and some distance from it.  the two top lights of the group of 3 seemed to be slowly moving around each other.  after some time the 3 lights disappeared and the one light was left.  shortly after the 3 re appeared but had ascended to a higher position.  this time the 2 bottom lights seemed to be slowly rotating around each other.  we got this footage on the camcorder.  the entire incident lasted just over 5 minutes.
content.summary: 4 amber lights hovering then 3 changed position

content.detailedDescription: At around 11pm, i was sitting out on my apartment patio smoking a cigarette, when i noticed a blue-white flash out of the corner of my eye towards the northwest.  i stood up and stared in the direction that the flash came from for about 1 minute or so, then i saw another blue-white flash that looked like it was coming from a star-like object.  i continued to focus my eyes directly where i witnessed the two flashes.  another couple of minutes went by when i noticed a dimly-lit, star-like object appear and begin to slowly descend towards the horizon.  all the while there were maybe two or three commercial planes and/or jets in the sky to reference to the anamoly. the object slowly descended out of view behind the apartment building across and to the side of my patio.
content.summary: Noticed a blue-white flash in the northwest out of the corner of my eye, upon looking i noticed another blue-white flash and then the object dimly lit up and began to descent lower to the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was facing west at old baldwin lake. i was on the south side of the lake. when from the north a pyramid like object with two pyramids about a 20th of the size of the craft on its "base" of the larger pyramid. started toward me in a southern direction. at this point i wasnt sure what i was seeing. i first thought it could be a helicopter. but quickly pushed that out of mind as it approached me. i remember thinkin that it had to be somethin military related. an then thinkin to myself. there is no way the military could make something like this and expect it to fly. it could only be from another world. it flew in a straight line over my head about 500 ft away. it made no noise. but as it flew over i noticed i could see lines between what i assumed to be panels on the craft. it glowed in a color that reminded me of extremely hot metal. i watched it fly over my head an toward the south for about 3 min traveling at a very slow speed. before it turned into a ball that looked similar to the sun. then started causing a pulsating light  and then traveling at a speed hundreds of times faster then it was previously and was gone.  affixed are two documents. one showing the craft that i drew. an the other is my location an the crafts travel path in reference to a map.
content.summary: A ufo flew over my head

content.detailedDescription: Near foster lake.
content.summary: Near foster lake.

content.detailedDescription: Got up to go to bathroom looked out the window toward the east saw a very large object in the sky no sound big lights blueish white pulsating lights  no plane lights on it no sound walked out on the porch took a very good look at it  run back in and tried to find my cam it was gone when i went back out no sign of it call me i have  more information to follow leading up to this night thank you i talked  to the guy in fort worth texas about this he wanted  me to put information here but i would like to talk to you if i can
content.summary: Hugh like a city in the sky or walmart

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out for a walk. as we came out the front door i noticed something to my left in the sky between some tree branches. it seemed odd and out of place. as me and my dog walked toward it under the tree i looked up and saw three bright orange lights in a triangle formation. we ran back into the house so i could grab my cell phone. my dog would not go back outside so i went out alone and now there were 4 orange lights in a staggered formation moving slowly from sw to ne as i video tapped them on my iphone 3gs 2 of the lights just "blinked out". then from the west a 5th light traveling extremely fast came over the tree line and came to a complete stop. it hovered for several moments. then it followed in the direction of the first 4 lights. they all eventually "blinked out". i was shaking the whole time. i've always wanted to see something but it was not how i expected it to go. there was absolutely no sound except for the crickets. my dog would not go outside until the next morning and she was still not happy about it. the first thing i did when i got back in the house was look at the clock to make sure i didn't loose any time, which i didn't.
content.summary: 3 lights in traingle formation. then 4 staggered then a 5th moving fast then stopping.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work noticed 3 lights tightly lined up hovering over side of freeway
content.summary: Driving home from work noticed 3 lights tightly lined up hovering over side of freeway

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, nephew, and i, were just driving home from karate, and saw an enormous orange orb in the sky. we see these at least 2-4 times each week, so it���s not really that big of a deal at this point (i���ve already put a report in on the mufon site). however, this orb was a little different.

tuesday night, on our way home (we were driving west), we saw a large orange orb in the twilight sky, and right as we lost it behind some trees, it flashed rapidly between red and white, then between red and orange. we watched the orb move farther south, over a period of about 40 minutes. by the time we got home at about 9pm, the orb was pretty far away and looked like a faint star that was moving slowly south west.

we thought it could be one of the orange orbs we see all the time, but couldn���t say for certain, because the orb didn���t do anything that couldn���t be attributed to some type of aircraft.

tonight (sept. 21, at approximately 10pm), we were driving home from karate (heading east), and we saw a very bright orange light in the southern part of the sky. it didn���t seem to be moving and looked very far away, so we figured it had to be a star or something. my husband tried to find it with google sky on his smart phone, but couldn���t. however, the object didn���t seem to be moving, and it was in the same spot earlier in the week, so we decided it was probably just a star.

so, about a mile away from home, (about 40 minutes later), my nephew was like, ���what���s that in the sky?��� we started talking about the object again, and i noted how it had moved up in the south-west part of the sky, and was now higher on the horizon. just then, my husband looked up, and the orb flashed white for a split-second, then vanished. 

we tried to guess how far away it was, but considering that we don���t know how big it was, it���s hard to say. if i had to guess, i���d say it was about 50 miles south, maybe about 20 miles or so, west of detroit. but that���s just a guess.

my husband, who normally writes off all orange orbs that aren���t right above him, as airplanes with their landing lights on, flying in on approach, could not attribute this to any aircraft.

seriously, we see these things so much now, that after the object vanished, we just sort of shrugged, then went about our business. also, the mufon form to report a sighting is extremely long and detailed. if i had to fill this thing out every time i saw a ufo, i'd probably freak out. as it stands, this is only my second report, and we've been seeing these things regularly since july.
content.summary: More orbs in michigan thumb area

content.detailedDescription:
I fell asleep in my recliner aprox. 9 p.M. both of my dogs slept on both sides of my chair on the floor.  my boyfriend was on the couch next to my recliner and he was asleep also.  aproximately 3 a.M. i awoke to a horrific jabbing pain im my mid-lower back right on my spinal column. upon awakening i can vividly remember sitting up and grabbing my back at the same time..As i turned to sit all the way up i saw a "large human like figure" turn away from me and proceeded to walk toward my front door with some sort of very large clear syringe he placed on his right hip like a gun would be placed for carrying purposes.  i remember trying to scream out and pointed at the same time but "nothing" would come out of my mouth no matter how hard i attempted to shout i could not produce even a whisper.  it was as if he possessed some sort of immortal power over my actions until he was out of my sight.  he never once turned around where i could see his face but he was all "black" and "soldier like in his walk...Like on a mission he needed to complete?"..."very muscular and strong in appearance".  i remember immediately grabbing my arms and saying to myself, "oh my god...I am not dreaming...This really did happen and this alien creature just inserted something into my back...Or took something out."...I had no further pain from that episode and could not bring myself to even tell my boyfriend about it for aproximately 6 months thinking my family would think i was insane..
one of the wierdest things about the situation was that both my dogs never even budged....Nor did my boyfriend wake up during the incident...I was in total disbelief.  not scared for some odd reason...Maybe because he never showed his face...I dont know. however, to this day...I don't know if he possibly abducted me during the night and had just finished bringing me back consciously by inserting some sort of medication to awaken me or not.   i "do know" for a fact that he had just finished using that large syringe on me because i watched his motions intently and he was walking away and at the same time placing that syringe to his hip "holster".  the last thing i saw was him walking towards the front door but right before he got to it he veered to the airconditioning vent as if he had come from "it". possibly from underground i wondered?  i then faded out for aprox. 30 minutes and awoke with a very clear vivid rememberance of this event.  i never believed or even thought something like this could be true but i now know they are out there and in our homes at their own leisure!!  they are "quiet", "meticulous", "strong", "unafraid", and i think "curious" in nature.  they seem to be in a "time zone" that only they are familiar with and seem to have that mastered so well as to quietly appear as they "need or want to" then disappear without a trace.  things are still happening here in gulf breeze and now in my new residence as "glowing type" foot prints are appearing continually everywhere on my carpet during the night!!  i am not a story teller and would love to take a polygraph so badly..People believe me...I do not know if there has been some sort of government cover up about this ufo issue but why would we have full grown aliens walking around right now in our homes of all places???  they had to grow to get that big so there has to be many many more of them...Right?  omg! i do not know why "i" am being targeted as an "experiment" to "him" or "them" but it is not ending for me...I really am not scared because i have never lost faith in my god above..He has his hand on me...But i really really need some help on this other issue...If there is some sort of alien specialist out there feel free to call...A.M. preferably...And only serious inquiries...I am not a gossipist or yapper....And would not be writing this if it were not true...But heed my words now...We are being watched and experimented on...I just dont know why or what they want...Be safe and please believe this is no joke folks..I now know they do exists.
content.summary: Aprox. 5 foot tall ..Only saw walking away from me with a large syringe attached to his hip like a gun would be attached....No sound and i could  not yell or speak.  he walked toward the vent in my house.

content.detailedDescription:
On september 20, 2011 in the city of maricopa, az, i was at my brother's house sitting outside watching the sky.  then possibly around 7:30 pm, i saw what could be termed as a meteorite falling at close proximity. that meteorite was a standard size meteorite falling, but the color was a green tail. it lasted less than a few seconds. the angle of that meteorite was not at a typical angle but horizontal heading south.
  then about 8:00 pm, i observed a pure orange light that was solid round about the size of a pea if it was held away from me at arms length.  it was located slightly se in direction at a distant what appeared to be less than a mile at a very low altitude near the horizon.  i had never observed in the past an orange light like this, but i was thinking that it may be coming from a jet heading my way. it didn't appeared to be flickering but just a solid orange light. the light just seemed more or less to be just hovering in the sky from my perspective.  regardless to if it was jet, i decided to take some pictures of it. the first sighting of it lasted about 14 seconds.  about a minute and 30 seconds earlier, there was a plane near the area flying bizarre: it looked like it was just circling this one particular area before finally heading off to the north. 
  shortly later after the first sighting, some of my family members came outside too. i was revealing to my mother what i just observed and i was beginning to show her the pictures i took when my brother yells out, "there's an orange light!"  i quickly aimed the camera and took some pictures.  i didn't tell my brother about the orange light, yet he spotted it for himself. that orange light briefly flashed on for a second or two, then simply stopped emitting light like somebody turned the lights out. it also was not in the same location i observed the first sighting for it was now directly due south.  then i noticed a very dimmed pin-point white light which was seen for a brief moment like a quick flash near its location; then another flash at a different location like upwards, then a flash downwards, move to left flash, move to right flash of light. then after the flash of white light, another orange ball of light lasting maybe 1 to 3 seconds.  i had my camera set at iso of 1600 with shutter speed of 1/30 second.  while watching for the orange lights, above our heads was another white light more meteorite that quickly went by in a second with tail at a 45 degree.  then shortly after that, another orange light sighting now located sw.   then few moments later, it was sighted directly south, then se.  it appeared to me that whatever it may be, it was moving at an astonishing rate almost like the orange light was instantaneously moving back-and-fourth and around which briefly emitted an orange light. this was clearly no airplane lights.  the general sighting of the orange light last about four minutes.
then about 30 minutes later, i observed a white light that flashed lights in a regular pattern while it moved horizontally across the sky. when it went behind a tree, i quickly walk out into the yard; however, it was not located again.  but briefly after that sighting, that orange light was sighted again directly south. which was also the last sighting of the orange light. before i left for home, i noticed an extremely bright light directly east.  possibly a star or planet, but extremely bright. i took a couple of pictures of that. it didn't seem to twinkle. a total of 4 people observed the orange light. no clouds. no wind.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid looking pure orange and round light appearing  and disappearing many times.

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were in a hot tub staring at the stars. my wife was watching what she thought was a satelite through the trees when the object got brighter and disappeared. seconds later i noticed the same object,(going the opposite direction from what my wife seen),and i said "hey look at the satelite." we watched the object get extremely brighter,(brighter than the north star),and then disappear. i asked my wife if she just saw what i did and thats when she told me about it doing the same thing though going the other direction. a few, (maybe 3?), minutes later we both see what appeared to be a boomerang or cheveron shaped object, but it looked invisible or cloaked,(if your a trekky). we could see the stars behind it but we also were able to see the shape. it flew off, out of our view, very quickly, but we were able to watch it until it was distance that allowed it to leave eye sight versus just disappearing as it had just minutes before, hard to explain. it reminded me of star trek when a ship is cloaked. the whole thing lasted for around 5 minutes. after words we couldn't believe it, but it was a shared experience, so we agreed it has some validity. i'm a 19y air force veteran who works on aircraft and could not explain what we had just seen.
content.summary: Satalite looking object changed directions, got brighter, and then disappered. re-appered briefly but looked invisible or cloaked.

content.detailedDescription: I live in an apartment.  the apartment faces east.  i was doing laundry in the complex laundry room.  i started at 4:30 in the morning.  i went to retrieve my laundry at about 10 minutes to six in the morning.  when i was returning to my apartment with the completed laundry i saw the light.  i set down my laundry basket and took out my cell phone to take the pictures.  the light was completely stationary.  there were no other lights of any kind present.  it was very large.  a single bright light.  6 am in the morning.  no stars or moon or sun present.  light out side but the sun wasn't visible yet.  the object was a very bright light.  i took four photos of it with my 8 mega pixel camera in my cell phone.  it was way too bright to be a star and there would have been other stars in the sky.  there were none. it was too light out side for there to be stars.  i stayed out side for about ten minutes and it never moved.  i went in side and didn't go back out for about a half hour.  when i did.  it was gone.  i regret not staying out there to see what if anything it would do.  it never moved.  i am 53 years old and i don't spook easily.  this thing spooked me.
content.summary: A single bright light.  6 am in the morning.  no stars or moon or sun present.  light out side but the sun wasn't visible yet.  a very bright light
